amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the 6 month moratorium on finalizing rules contained in title I.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-361 to strike the 6 month moratorium on finalizing rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
